    (function () {

        // our Logger object
        var Logger = {
            _instance: undefined, // we shouldn't directly touch it, it's used inside of require block
            _queue: [], // the queue should be used when _instance is not defined
            log: function (label, logObj, additionalParams) {
                additionalParams = additionalParams || {};
                if (this._instance) {
                    if (!additionalParams.preLoad) {
                        additionalParams.preLoad = 'no';
                    }
                    this._instance.logError(label, logObj, additionalParams);
                } else {
                    // we don't have a logger yet, so just queue it
                    additionalParams.preLoad = 'yes';
                    this._queue.push({
                        label: label,
                        logObj: logObj,
                        additionalParams: additionalParams
                    });
                }
            }
        };

        // it's safe to attach all handlers here
        window.addEventListener('error', function (errorEvent) {
            Logger.log('1dClientSideError', errorEvent.error, {errorMessage: errorEvent.message});
        });

        window.addEventListener('load', function () {
            if ((!document.getElementById('new-homepage-search-wizard') || !document.getElementById('new-homepage-search-wizard').hasChildNodes()) &&

                    pageUrl: encodeURIComponent(window.location.href)
                });
            }
        });

        require('dctk/clientLogging', function (clientLogging) {
            // the logger is ready, we can just get a reference to it
            Logger._instance = clientLogging;
            // then process the queue
            while (Logger._queue.length) {
                var queueEntry = Logger._queue.shift();
                Logger.log(queueEntry.label, queueEntry.logObj, queueEntry.additionalParams);
            }
        });

    })();

            require(['jquery', 'dctk/dctk'], function($, dctk) {

                        // Workaround for logExperiment() not waiting for Omniture to be initialized
                        // or for the event to be sent successfully.
                        dctk.onReady(function() {
                            setTimeout(function() {
                                window.location.href = url;
                            }, 500);
                        });
                    }});
                });
            });

id="pocket-guide-section-header"   class="cols-row-header cf section-header no-group"><h2 class="section-header-main">Madrid Hotel Guide</h2></header><span id="content-teaser"><div><p><h4>Top Madrid Accommodations</h4> Rather than scouring the net for somewhere to stay in Madrid, save yourself the time and hassle with Expedia. There's a significant range of places to look into, 421 of them within 1 mile of the area's beating heart.</p><p>The <a href="https://www.expedia.com/Madrid-Hotels-Hotel-Villa-Magna.h16416.Hotel-Information">Hotel Villa Magna</a> and the <a href="https://www.expedia.com/Madrid-Hotels-Hotel-Ritz.h26286.Hotel-Information">Hotel Ritz</a> should be at the top of the list of hotels you check out if youâ€™re planning to stay downtown. Also close to the center of Madrid are the <a href="https://www.expedia.com/Madrid-Hotels-AC-Santo-Mauro-Autograph-Collection.h27247.Hotel-Information">AC Santo Mauro, Autograph Collection</a> and <a href="https://www.expedia.com/Madrid-Hotels-The-Westin-Palace-Madrid.h10975.Hotel-Information">The Westin Palace, Madrid</a>.</p><p>One of the most well-known suburbs to find accommodation is Gran Via. Not only is it just 0.3 miles from the heart of the city, it also has a strong selection of 132 hotels. Several of the most crowd-pleasing places include the <a href="https://www.expedia.com/Madrid-Hotels-Abalu-Boutique-Suites-And-Residences.h4241232.Hotel-Information">Abalu Boutique Suites & Residences</a> and <a href="https://www.expedia.com/Madrid-Hotels-Splendom-Suites-Gran-Via.h6931885.Hotel-Information">Splendom Suites Gran VÃ­a</a>. Madrid City Centre, a quick 0.5 miles away, is one more ideal suburb to spend your nights. Youâ€™re not limited for options here either, with 445 hotels to choose from. The <a href="https://www.expedia.com/Madrid-Hotels-Relais-And-Chateaux-Hotel-Orfila.h570971.Hotel-Information">Relais & ChÃ¢teaux Hotel Orfila</a> and <a href="https://www.expedia.com/Madrid-Hotels-Unico-Hotel.h2373884.Hotel-Information">Unico Hotel</a> are some that won't let you down.</p><p>A popular option when visiting Madrid is to stay close to the Madrid Zoo Aquarium. The AC Hotel La Finca by Marriott is within driving distance.</p><p>Watch as the pupils and lecturers roam around the Complutense University of Madrid campus. Now envision the differences between the social scene of today, compared to decades ago. If this sounds like a spot you'd be excited to see, think about booking your accommodations at the Urban and NH Collection Palacio de Tepa.</p><p>Here at Expedia, we fully appreciate that travelers have varying vacation budgets. If you're seeking a hotel at the cheaper end of the scale, Madrid has some nice options. The Hotel Francisco I and the Artrip are a couple of the best options around. Alternative lower-cost hotels are the Aparthotel RamÃ³n de la Cruz 41 and the Hostal Sil & Serranos</p><p><h4>Attractions and Hotels Near Madrid</h4> Why don't you broaden your horizons and enjoy the many delights dotted around Madrid while you are here? Madrid is marked by forests and rivers. Popular Madrid tourist attractions are old towns, historic palaces and war relics and monuments. Popular activities in this part of Spain include mountain biking and hiking.</p><p>Some close by places to check out in Madrid are Alcobendas and Fuenlabrada. Alcobendas is 9 miles to the northeast of Madrid, while Fuenlabrada is 10 miles to the southwest. Alcobendas hotels include the Rafaelhoteles Madrid Norte and Hotel La Moraleja. The MC Las Provincias and Hotel Ciudad de Fuenlabrada are some of the hotels and apartments in Fuenlabrada.</p><p><h4>How to Get to Madrid</h4> Located 8 miles away from Madrid is Barajas Airport. Stay nearby at the Hilton Madrid Airport or the MeliÃ¡ Barajas.</p></div></span><span class="rm-hide" id="content-block-body"><div id="contentBlockBody"><p></div></span></section><button type="button"                             clientLogging.logTrxEvent('adtkAdSlotsSuccess', ['adtkAdSlotsSuccess=0']);
                            break;
                    }
                });
            }
        }

        /**
         * Sorts through data from the current document.cookie collection and organizes it
         * into specifically referenced fields.
         */
        function loadDataFromCookies() {
            var cookieArray = document.cookie.split(';'),
                processMediaCookie = function(cookieValue) {
                    var parts = cookieValue.split('|'),
                        itemValues;
                    for (var i = 0; i < parts.length; i++) {
                        if (parts[i] !== undefined && parts[i].length >= 4) {
                            itemValues = parts[i].split(',');
                            if (itemValues.length >= 4) {
                                if (itemValues[2] === 'BKC') {
                                    blueKai.push(itemValues[3]);
                                } else if (itemValues[2] === 'TDEST') {
                                    tdest.push(itemValues[3]);
                                } else if (itemValues[2] === 'PDEST') {
                                    pdest.push(itemValues[3]);
                                }
                            }
                        }
                    }
                },
                processMC1Cookie = function(cookieValue) {
                    var parts = cookieValue.split('=');
                    if (parts.length >= 2) {
                        userId = parts[1];
                    }
                };

            for (var i = 0; i < cookieArray.length; i++) {
                var cookie = trim(cookieArray[i]),
                    separatorIndex = cookie.indexOf('='),
                    name = (separatorIndex > -1) ? trim(cookie.substr(0, separatorIndex)) : undefined,
                    value = (separatorIndex > -1) ? decodeURIComponent(trim(cookie.substr(separatorIndex+1))) : undefined;

                if (name !== undefined && value !== undefined) {
                    switch(name) {
                        case 'MediaCookie':
                            processMediaCookie(value);
                            break;
                        case 'MC1':
                            processMC1Cookie(value);
                            break;
                    }
                }
            }
        }

        function initializeAds() {
            if (autoInitialize === true) {
                require('adtoolkit', function(adtk) {
                    adtk.initialize();
                });
            }
            scriptsLoaded = true;
            onItemLoaded();

            if(deferServiceCalls === false) {
                makeServiceCall();
            }
        }

        function makeServiceCall() {
            loadSlotInfo();

            // Load user targeting; if we don't auto generate user info then wait for it to be passed in
            if (autoGenerateUserInfo === true) {
                loadTargeting();
            } else {
                require('adtoolkit-user-info', function (userinfo) {
                    if (userinfo) {
                        if (userinfo.hasOwnProperty('memberId')) {
                            memberId = userinfo.memberId;
                        }
                        if (userinfo.hasOwnProperty('userId')) {
                            userId = userinfo.userId;
                        }
                        if (userinfo.hasOwnProperty('isBot')) {
                            // translate from string if string
                            isBot = (true == userinfo.isBot);
                        }
                    }
                    loadTargeting();
                });
            }
        }

        define('adtoolkit', ['expads'], function(expads) {
            return {
                initialize: function () {
                    if(deferServiceCalls === true){
                        makeServiceCall();
                    }
                    deferred.done(function () {
                        expads.initialize();
                    })
                        .fail(function (message) {
                            console.log(message);
                        });
                },
                refresh: function(targeting) {
                    if (targeting === undefined) {
                        expads.refresh();
                    } else {
                        var adinfoParams = defaultAdinfoParams(),
                            adinfo = cleanTargetingArgs(targeting);
                        addIfNonEmpty(adinfoParams, 'dest', adinfo.dest_region);
                        loadAdinfo(adinfoParams, targeting, function(updatedTargeting) {
                            expads.refresh(updatedTargeting)
                        });
                    }
                }
            }
        });

        $(document).ready(initializeAds); // TODO: should we initialize on window load or document ready?
    });
})(window, document);

</script>

        <script async defer>
    //UITK Typeahead Accessibility Fix
    require(['jquery', 'uitk', 'uitk_typeahead'], function($, uitk, uitkTypeahead){
        uitkTypeahead.prototype.next = function() {
            var links = this.$ta.find("a"),
                current = this.$ta.find(".highlight").removeClass("highlight"),
                i = links.index(current),
                next = links[i + 1],
                nextId = $(next).attr("id"),
                item, a11yText = "";
            $(current).attr("aria-selected", "false");
            if ($(links[i + 1]).hasClass("close")) {
                uitk.utils.liveAnnounce(i.t("close"), "assertive")
            }
            if (!$("html").hasClass("safari")) {
                if (this.firstItemFlag === true) {
                    this.firstItemFlag = false
                } else {
                    if (typeof links[i] === "undefined") {
                        item = $(".active-tooltip").find("a")[0];
                        a11yText = $(item).attr("data-value");
                        uitk.utils.liveAnnounce(a11yText, "polite")
                    }
                }
            }
            if (next) {
                $(next).addClass("highlight");
                $(next).attr("aria-selected", "true");
                this.$element.attr("aria-activedescendant", nextId);
                if($(next).attr("data-value")){
                    uitk.utils.liveAnnounce($(next).attr("data-value"), "polite")
                }
            } else {
                uitk.utils.liveAnnounce(this.$element.val(), "polite")
            }
        };


        uitkTypeahead.prototype.prev = function() {
            var links = this.$ta.find("a"),
                current = this.$ta.find(".highlight").removeClass("highlight"),
                i = links.index(current),
                prev = links[i - 1],
                prevId = $(prev).attr("id");
            $(current).attr("aria-selected", "false");
            if (prev) {
                $(prev).addClass("highlight");
                $(prev).attr("aria-selected", "true");
                this.$element.attr("aria-activedescendant", prevId)
                if($(prev).attr('data-value')) {
                    uitk.utils.liveAnnounce($(prev).attr('data-value'), 'polite');
                }
            } else {
                this.$element.removeAttr("aria-activedescendant");
                $('[aria-selected="true"]').attr("aria-selected", "false");
                uitk.utils.liveAnnounce(this.$element.val(), "polite")
            }
        };
    });

</script>

There's a significant range of places to look into, 421 of them within 1 mile of the area's beating heart. The Hotel Villa Magna and the Hotel Ritz should be at the top of the list of hotels you check out if youâ€™re planning to stay downtown. Also close to the center of Madrid are the AC Santo Mauro, Autograph Collection and The Westin Palace, Madrid . One of the most well-known suburbs to find accommodation is Gran Via. Not only is it just 0.3 miles from the heart of the city, it also has a strong selection of 132 hotels. Several of the most crowd-pleasing places include the Abalu Boutique Suites & Residences and Splendom Suites Gran VÃ­a . Madrid City Centre, a quick 0.5 miles away, is one more ideal suburb to spend your nights. Youâ€™re not limited for options here either, with 445 hotels to choose from. The Relais & ChÃ¢teaux Hotel Orfila and Unico Hotel are some that won't let you down. A popular option when visiting Madrid is to stay close to the Madrid Zoo Aquarium. The AC Hotel La Finca by Marriott is within driving distance. Watch as the pupils and lecturers roam around the Complutense University of Madrid campus. Now envision the differences between the social scene of today, compared to decades ago. If this sounds like a spot you'd be excited to see, think about booking your accommodations at the Urban and NH Collection Palacio de Tepa. Here at Expedia, we fully appreciate that travelers have varying vacation budgets. If you're seeking a hotel at the cheaper end of the scale, Madrid has some nice options. The Hotel Francisco I and the Artrip are a couple of the best options around. Alternative lower-cost hotels are the Aparthotel RamÃ³n de la Cruz 41 and the Hostal Sil & Serranos Attractions and Hotels Near Madrid Why don't you broaden your horizons and enjoy the many delights dotted around Madrid while you are here? Madrid is marked by forests and rivers. Popular Madrid tourist attractions are old towns, historic palaces and war relics and monuments. Popular activities in this part of Spain include mountain biking and hiking. Some close by places to check out in Madrid are Alcobendas and Fuenlabrada. Alcobendas is 9 miles to the northeast of Madrid, while Fuenlabrada is 10 miles to the southwest. Alcobendas hotels include the Rafaelhoteles Madrid Norte and Hotel La Moraleja. The MC Las Provincias and Hotel Ciudad de Fuenlabrada are some of the hotels and apartments in Fuenlabrada. How to Get to Madrid Located 8 miles away from Madrid is Barajas Airport. Stay nearby at the Hilton Madrid Airport or the MeliÃ¡ Barajas.
